com.github.clownvin.jtwitchbot.channels

Class ChannelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.clownvin.jtwitchbot.channels.ChannelManager

  • public class ChannelManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Calvin Channel manager object that manages all Channel containers for a ServerConnection

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String channel)
        Allows other objects to test whether or not this object contains a channel container with the channel name of the String provided.
        Parameters:
        channel - the string to match against.
        Returns:
        true if there is a container using that channel already, or false if there isn't.

      • findUser

        public User findUser(java.lang.String username)

      • forceRefresh

        public void forceRefresh()
        Forces a channel refresh by interrupting the channelRefreshThread.

      • getChannel

        public Channel getChannel(java.lang.String channel)
        Allows other objects to get the container object using the same name as the String provided.
        Parameters:
        channel - name of the channel to match against.
        Returns:
        the channel container object with the same name, or null if there isn't one.

      • getChannels

        public java.util.ArrayList<Channel> getChannels()
        Allows other objects to access the ArrayList of channels.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of channels containers.

      • joinChannel

        public void joinChannel(java.lang.String channel)
        Sends a JOIN command for the channel requested. Upon joining, input and output between this channel will be possible.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to join.
